extension_description.message: Guqulela umbhalo okhethiweyo kwiphepha lewebhu kwaye uguqulele kwifomathi ethile.

turn_off_description.message: Iqhosha lokuguqulela liza kuvela ngalo lonke ixesha umbhalo ukhethiwe

turn_on_description.message: Iqhosha lokuguqulela alizukuvela xa okubhaliweyo kukhethiwe kodwa usenako ukuguqulela ngokucofa i icon yePro Translate kwibar yesixhobo

auto_switch_description.message: Xa umbhalo okhethiweyo ilulwimi ekujoliswe kulo, luguqulele kulwimi lwesibini ekujoliswe kulo

target_format_description.message: Khetha ifomathi ekujoliswe kuyo engagqibekanga, ifomathi ingatshintshwa kwiqela lenjongo yokuguqulela

auto_set_format_description.message: Xa utshintsho lwefomathi kwiphaneli yoguqulo, seta ifomathi ekhethiweyo kwifomati emiyo

format_and_order_description.message: Iimeko zefomathi ezinokutshintshwa kwiphaneli yoguqulo kunye nolandelelwano lokubonisa

translate_button_on_description.message: Iqhosha lokuguqulela liza kuvela ngalo lonke ixesha umbhalo ukhethiwe

translate_button_off_description.message: Iqhosha lokuguqulela alizukuvela xa okubhaliweyo kukhethiwe kodwa usenako ukuguqulela ngokucofa i icon yePro Translate kwibar yesixhobo
